About Me

Howdy, I'm Nathan üëãüèª

In my personal time, I'm an independent software developer making apps for Linux (primarily GNOME, using technologies like GTK and libadwaita). I also tinker with smaller projects meant to improve the lives of folks using Linux and other free desktops.

Professionally, I'm a Newsroom Support Engineer for Freedom of the Press Foundation. I work on SecureDrop, an anonymous whistleblowing platform.

I'm currently in kidney failure and actively seeking a kidney donation.

Please Consider a Life Saving Donation
